text: @ScottMorrisonMP WHAT ABOUT STUDENTS. I lost my job yesterday because of COVID-19, and now I cant pay rent let alone buy groceries. My youth allowance for students isnt enough. WHY ARENT WE ELIGIBLE FOR THE CORONAVIRUS $550 per fortnight stimulus?
